properties.name: riot.api.version
properties.description: Version of Riot API used to fetch data, can provide older one to get older data(required to disable auto updating).

properties.name: riot.api.locale
properties.description: Provides a locale used in fetching data. Using different locale will change the language of champions bio etc.

properties.name: riot.api.key
properties.description: Provides API key. It's necessary and it's highly recommended that it's going to be passed via environmental variable, to avoid Leaking.

properties.name: images.directory
properties.description: Directory where all of the images are stored.

properties.name: riot.api.ddragon
properties.description: ddragon endpoint for all basic data and arts.
